title: Will tech companies be broken up? - Quora

response.answer_text: Only if the major stockholders of each company see a threat to their stock value or an imminent government move to break them up, those shareholders will aggressively lobby congress and spend big bucks to steer the legislation to their favor, which will undoubtedly include a behind the scenes operations to make sure any spinoff companies stock is quickly snapped up by the same stockholders of the original mega companies!! my 2cents!!!
